name: Ghost of Gulsea
description:
Two decades ago, Malorie Astair murdered her husband and his mistress in cold blood, even burning the house they were in to the ground to cover her tracks. Not once has her crime faced the light of day.

Now it has come back to haunt her. Amidst the Astair family reunion, strange events keep happening. All signs point to the ghost of Elise Gulsea, the mistress, as being the culprit. Adler is the only one who doesn’t believe it, but as the first sightings of the ghost do little more than property damage, the events are brushed off.

It is only when the house becomes sealed and blood is spilled that the family becomes torn. Ghost or psycho? Fiction or Reality? Challenge the Ghost to prove what is stronger, the the ghost or your truth.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The Ghost of Gulsea is a story inspired by both Umineko When They Cry and Corpse Party. To figure out the truth, you will have to do more than just play through to the end, you will have to actually experience everything you can, find the truth, not wait for it.
